docs.text: A place to consolidate 3D printer modding resources
docs.title: Home

docs.text: The Neptune 3 runs on a modified Marlin firmware by default. All versions of the default firmware can be found here: https://github.com/NARUTOfzr/Neptune_3
docs.title: Marlin (Factory default)

docs.text: For a dual extruder setup on the Neptune 3, a number of parts are needed. Nema 17 Stepper Motor Cable to connect the motor with the driver TMC2209 Driver Extruder A Y splitter between the two extruders and the existing hotend (Can be printed)
docs.title: Dual Extruder
